item.title: Lords Ishwar Hotels Ltd Falls 1.70%: Valuation Shifts Amid 52-Week Low
item.description: Lords Ishwar Hotels Ltd experienced a challenging week, closing at Rs.14.49 on 13 Feb 2026, down 1.70% from the previous Friday’s close of Rs.14.74. This decline contrasted with the broader Sensex, which fell by 0.54% over the same period, indicating a relative underperformance. The week was marked by a notable valuation re-rating, a fresh 52-week low, and subdued quarterly results, all contributing to the stock’s cautious trading pattern. Time: 45 minutes ago

item.title: Karma Energy Ltd Gains 12.96%: 4 Key Events Driving the Weekly Rally
item.description: Karma Energy Ltd delivered a strong performance this week, gaining 12.96% from Rs.40.83 on 6 Feb to close at Rs.46.12 on 13 Feb 2026. This rally notably outpaced the Sensex, which declined by 0.54% over the same period. The stock’s surge was marked by multiple upper circuit hits, robust buying interest, and a spike in delivery volumes, despite the company’s recent downgrade to a Strong Sell rating by MarketsMOJO. However, the final session saw a sharp correction amid broader market weakness, highlighting a mixed but predominantly bullish sentiment for the week. Time: 47 minutes ago
